description: Kaminaitsu is http://anidb.net/ch1656 [Sadaharu]`s makeshift guardian spirit, representing http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki]`s spirit of ill will over a lack of toilet paper and nobody bringing it to him every morning. While wondering to a nearby store to buy it, he also walks Sadaharu.
name: Kaminaitsu
